languages.text: "Вы правы, сестра. Море Душ способно потопить даже самых умелых пустотников, ибо нет обманчивей ощущения, чем обузданный варп".
"You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."
languages.original_text: "Вы правы, сестра. Море Душ способно потопить даже самых умелых пустотников, ибо нет обманчивей ощущения, чем обузданный варп".

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

languages.text: “你说得没错，修女，灵魂之海甚至足以吞噬技艺最为精湛的虚空之子。如果有人相信亚空间可以被驯服，那就是在相信幻觉。”
languages.original_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，修女，灵魂之海甚至足以吞噬技艺最为精湛的虚空之子。如果有人相信亚空间可以被驯服，那就是在相信幻觉。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene razón, hermana. El Mar de Almas puede devorar incluso a los viajeros del vacío más avezados, pues creer que se puede doblegar es una de sus trampas».
languages.original_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, hermana. El mar de almas puede devorar incluso a los viajeros del vacío más avezados, pues creer que se puede doblegar es una de sus trampas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「その通りよ、シスター。魂の海は、最も熟練したヴォイズマンでさえもむしばむことがある。〈歪み〉を制御できると信じることは、妄想を信じることに等しいものよ」
languages.original_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りよ、シスター。魂の海は、最も熟練したヴォイズマンでさえもむしばむことがある。〈歪み〉を制御できると信じることは、妄想を信じることに等しいものよ」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Schwester. Das Meer der Seelen kann selbst die erfahrensten Raumfahrer verschlingen, denn an einen gezähmten Warp zu glauben, heißt, einer Illusion zu glauben."
languages.original_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Schwester." Das Meer der Seelen kann selbst die erfahrensten Raumfahrer verschlingen, denn an einen gezähmten Warp zu glauben, heißt, einer Illusion zu glauben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, ma sœur. Même les cosmomarins les plus chevronnés ne sont pas à l'abri de la voracité de la Mer des Âmes, car ceux qui croient pouvoir dompter le Warp se bercent d'illusions. »
languages.original_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, ma sœur. Même les cosmomarins les plus chevronnés ne sont pas à l'abri de la voracité de la Mer des Âmes, car ceux qui croient pouvoir dompter le Warp se bercent d'illusions. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın Rahibe. Ruhlar Denizi en hünerli uçsuz erlerini bile tüketebilir, öteboyutun ehlileştirilebileceğine inanmak deliliktir."
languages.original_text: "You are right, Sister. The Sea of Souls can devour even the most skilled voidsmen, for to believe in a tamed warp is to believe in a delusion."
